description:
At 22L with a large main compartment, this backpack is designed to take on your daily needs. The Jester's internal laptop and table pockets are padded to protect your tech, while the foam shoulder straps and padded back panel keep it comfortable when carrying a heavier load.

  • Made of durable recycled polyester with a DWR finish
  • FlexVent suspension system provides a comfortable carry thanks to injection-moulded foam shoulder straps and a padded back panel with a mesh overlay
  • Large main compartment swallows books and groceries
  • Front organizer compartment has zippered pockets, pen slots and a padded tablet sleeve
  • Sleeve in main compartment holds a 15in. laptop and is padded for extra protection
  • Front elastic bungee system and side mesh pockets hold extras
  • Base allows it to stand upright so it's easier to load
name: The North Face Jester 22 Daypack - Women's
